PHRASE.LANG: This certificate of attendance is awarded to people who watch a lot of matches.
Certificat de participation accordé aux personnes ayant assisté à un grand nombre de matchs.
Dieses Anwesenheitszertifikat wird an Zuschauer verliehen, die viele Spiele gesehen haben.
Questo attestato di presenza viene dato a coloro che assistono a molte partite.
Este certificado de asistencia se concede a gente que ve muchos partidos.
イベント参加証明書です。
This certificate of attendance is awarded to people who watch a lot of matches.
This certificate of attendance is awarded to people who watch a lot of matches.
